name: shelly plant cozy
sizes_available: sizes will vary depending on your own tension
notes:
***these super cute house plant pot cozies are great for adding a touch of crochet to your home!  the pattern is adaptable to other pot sizes and also stretches to fit different pot styles.  perfect for a gift to yourself or a loved one!*** 

if you have any questions about this pattern or any of the other patterns from regina p designs, or want to show off your finished projects with our patterns, please join our facebook group.
https://www.facebook.com/groups/869715883461437/

check out regina p. designs website to find out more, get sneak peeks, free patterns, & sales! https://www.reginapdesigns.com/

***materials:***
yarn bee soft & sleek yarns(approx. 90 yds total)
i(boye 5.25 mm) hook
scissors
needle

***abbreviations(us terms):***
sk = skip
st =stitch
sts = stitches
blo = back loop only
sc = single crochet
fbl = front bottom loop
hdc = half double crochet
dc = double crochet
shell = 4 dc in one stitch
gap =  between st 2 and 3 of the shell 
mr = magic ring
